subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Ligue Nord-Américaine de Hockey, a semiprofessional league, takes its mayhem to small rinks around Quebec and draws a surprising number of former N.H.L. players.
snippet: The Ligue Nord-Américaine de Hockey, a semiprofessional league, takes its mayhem to small rinks around Quebec and draws a surprising number of former N.H.L. players.
